scripts.gql:definitions: concurrently "npm run gql:definitions:*" && npm run format:gql
scripts.migrate:dev:create:users: npx dotenv -e ./apps/users/.env -- npx prisma migrate dev --create-only --schema ./apps/users/src/utils/prisma/users.prisma
scripts.migrate:deploy:users: npx dotenv -e ./apps/users/.env -- npx prisma migrate deploy --preview-feature --schema ./apps/users/src/utils/prisma/users.prisma
scripts.migrate:reset:users: npx dotenv -e ./apps/users/.env -- npx prisma migrate reset --preview-feature --schema ./apps/users/src/utils/prisma/users.prisma
scripts.migrate:dev:create:products: npx dotenv -e ./apps/products/.env -- npx prisma migrate dev --create-only --schema ./apps/users/src/utils/prisma/products.prisma
scripts.migrate:deploy:products: npx dotenv -e ./apps/products/.env -- npx prisma migrate deploy --preview-feature --schema ./apps/users/src/utils/prisma/products.prisma
scripts.migrate:reset:products: npx dotenv -e ./apps/products/.env -- npx prisma migrate reset --preview-feature --schema ./apps/users/src/utils/prisma/products.prisma
scripts.migrate:dev:create:storage: npx dotenv -e ./apps/storage/.env -- npx prisma migrate dev --create-only --schema ./apps/storage/src/utils/prisma/storage.prisma
scripts.migrate:deploy:storage: npx dotenv -e ./apps/storage/.env -- npx prisma migrate deploy --preview-feature --schema ./apps/storage/src/utils/prisma/storage.prisma
scripts.migrate:reset:storage: npx dotenv -e ./apps/storage/.env -- npx prisma migrate reset --preview-feature --schema ./apps/storage/src/utils/prisma/storage.prisma
scripts.migrate:dev:create:orders: npx dotenv -e ./apps/orders/.env -- npx prisma migrate dev --create-only --schema ./apps/orders/src/utils/prisma/orders.prisma
scripts.migrate:deploy:orders: npx dotenv -e ./apps/orders/.env -- npx prisma migrate deploy --preview-feature --schema ./apps/orders/src/utils/prisma/orders.prisma
scripts.migrate:reset:orders: npx dotenv -e ./apps/orders/.env -- npx prisma migrate reset --preview-feature --schema ./apps/orders/src/utils/prisma/orders.prisma
